languages.text: {n}Душно. Шумно. Гул и жужжание механизмов заглушают мысли. Воздух звенит от напряжения... Это мощь энергии, текущей по проводам, или стенания рабочих слились в какофонию возмущенных шепотов и отчаянных молитв? Заблудшие, погрязшие в мелких проблемах, не думающие о долге. Их скрипучие голоса будто покрыты ржавчиной. Глаза потускнели от бесконечной рутины и отсутствия света здесь, на рабочих палубах великого ковчега Домин.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Душно. Шумно. В этом месте гул и жужжание механизмов всегда заглушают мысли. Воздух звенит от напряжения... это мощь движущей силы, или стенания рабочих слились в какофонию из возмущенных шепотов и отчаянных молитв? Заблудшие, погрязшие в своих мелких проблемах, не знающие долга и чести. Их души покрыты ржавчиной. Их глаза потускнели от бесконечной рутины и отсутствия света здесь, на нижних палубах великого ковчега Эним.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Stale air. Oppressive noise. The hum and whirr of machinery drown out all thoughts. This place rings with tension... Is it the powerful energy coursing through the cables, or have the wails of the workers merged into a cacophony of indignant whispers and desperate prayers? Lost, mired in petty troubles, unmindful of duty, their voices creak as if covered in rust and their eyes are dimmed by the endless drudgery and lack of light here on the working decks of the Domin's great ark.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Душно. Шумно. Гул и жужжание механизмов заглушают мысли. Воздух звенит от напряжения... {n}Stuffy. Noisy. The hum and whirr of machinery drowns out thoughts. The air rings with tension.... Is it the power of the Motive Force, or have the wails of the workers merged into a cacophony of indignant whispers and desperate prayers? Lost, mired in petty troubles, unmindful of duty. Their souls are covered in rust. Eyes dimmed by the endless drudgery and lack of light here on the working decks of Enim's great ark.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Abgestandene Luft. Erdrückender Lärm. Das Summen und Surren von Maschinen übertönt jeden Gedanken. Hier dröhnt es vor Anspannung ... Ist es die mächtige Energie, die in den Kabeln fließt, oder sind die Schreie der Arbeiter zu einer Kakophonie des entrüsteten Flüsterns und der verzweifelten Gebete verschmolzen? Sie sind verloren, gelähmt von nichtigen Sorgen, vergessen ihre Pflicht. Ihre Stimmen klingen, als wären sie von Rost überzogen, und ihre Augen getrübt von der endlosen Plackerei und dem Mangel an Licht hier auf den Arbeitsdecks der großen Arche {rt_mf|des|der} Domin.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Stale air. Oppressive noise. The hum and whirr of machinery drown out all thoughts. This place rings with tension... Is it the powerful energy coursing through the cables, or have the wails of the workers merged into a cacophony of indignant whispers and desperate prayers? Lost, mired in petty troubles, unmindful of duty, their voices creak as if covered in rust and their eyes are dimmed by the endless drudgery and lack of light here on the working decks of the Domin's great ark.{/n}

Ist es die mächtige Energie, die in den Kabeln fließt, oder sind die Schreie der Arbeiter zu einer Kakophonie des entrüsteten Flüsterns und der verzweifelten Gebete verschmolzen? Sie sind verloren, gelähmt von nichtigen Sorgen, vergessen ihre Pflicht. Ihre Stimmen klingen, als wären sie von Rost überzogen, und ihre Augen getrübt von der endlosen Plackerei und dem Mangel an Licht hier auf den Arbeitsdecks der großen Arche {mf|des|der} Domin.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Aire viciado. Ruido opresivo. El zumbido y el rechino de la maquinaria ahoga todo pensamiento. Este lugar vibra con tensión... ¿Es la poderosa energía que recorre los cables o es que los lamentos de los trabajadores se han combinado en una cacofonía de susurros indignados y plegarias desesperadas? Perdidas, atrapadas en problemas insignificantes e irrespetuosas del deber, sus voces rechinan como cubiertas de óxido y sus ojos están oscurecidos por el perpetuo trabajo pesado y la falta de luz de las cubiertas de trabajo del gran arca de{rt_mf|l| la} Domin.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Stale air. Oppressive noise. The hum and whirr of machinery drown out all thoughts. This place rings with tension... Is it the powerful energy coursing through the cables, or have the wails of the workers merged into a cacophony of indignant whispers and desperate prayers? Lost, mired in petty troubles, unmindful of duty, their voices creak as if covered in rust and their eyes are dimmed by the endless drudgery and lack of light here on the working decks of the Domin's great ark.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Aire viciado. Ruido opresivo. El zumbido y el rechino de la maquinaria ahoga todo pensamiento. Este lugar vibra con tensión... ¿Es la poderosa energía que recorre los cables o es que los lamentos de los trabajadores se han combinado en una cacofonía de susurros indignados y plegarias desesperadas? Perdidas, atrapadas en problemas insignificantes e irrespetuosas del deber, sus voces rechinan como cubiertas de óxido y sus ojos están oscurecidos por el perpetuo trabajo pesado y la falta de luz de las cubiertas de trabajo del gran arca de{mf|l| la} Domin.{/n}

languages.text: {n}よどんだ空気。押し寄せる騒音。機械のうなり声があらゆる思考をかき消す。この場所は緊張感に包まれている…ケーブルに流れる強力なエネルギーのせいなのか、それとも労働者の叫びが憤りのささやきや絶望の祈りの不協和音に溶け込んだのだろうか？迷い、些細なトラブルに巻き込まれ、義務もわきまえず、その声は錆に覆われたように軋み、ドミンの偉大なる箱舟の作業デッキでは、終わりのない重労働とこの場の光不足のせいで、彼らの目はかすんでいる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Stale air. Oppressive noise. The hum and whirr of machinery drown out all thoughts. This place rings with tension... Is it the powerful energy coursing through the cables, or have the wails of the workers merged into a cacophony of indignant whispers and desperate prayers? Lost, mired in petty troubles, unmindful of duty, their voices creak as if covered in rust and their eyes are dimmed by the endless drudgery and lack of light here on the working decks of the Domin's great ark.{/n}

languages.text: {n}陈腐的空气，充满压迫感的噪音。机械的嗡嗡声淹没了所有思绪。这片区域充斥着紧张的氛围……是由于电缆中的能量呼啸而过，还是由于工人们的哀号化为了愤怒的低语与绝望的祈祷？他们声音喑哑，他们迷失了方向，陷入了无穷无尽的琐屑烦恼之中，未能尽到责任。由于他们在方舟上无休止地辛苦工作，长期处于黑暗之中，他们的眼中也失去了光亮。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Stale air. Oppressive noise. The hum and whirr of machinery drown out all thoughts. This place rings with tension... Is it the powerful energy coursing through the cables, or have the wails of the workers merged into a cacophony of indignant whispers and desperate prayers? Lost, mired in petty troubles, unmindful of duty, their voices creak as if covered in rust and their eyes are dimmed by the endless drudgery and lack of light here on the working decks of the Domin's great ark.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}陈腐的空气，充满压迫感的噪音。机械的嗡嗡声淹没了所有思绪。这片区域充斥着紧张的氛围……是由于电缆中的能量呼啸而过，还是由于工人们的哀号化为了愤怒的低语与绝望的祈祷？他们声音喑哑，他们迷失了方向，陷入了无穷无尽的琐屑烦恼之中，未能尽到责任。由于他们在方舟上无休止地辛苦工作，长期处于黑暗之中，他们的眼中也失去了光亮。{/n}

languages.text: {n}De l'air vicié. Un vacarme oppressant. Le bourdonnement et le ronronnement des machines noient toute pensée. Partout résonne une tension presque palpable. Est-ce l'afflux d'énergie qui circule à travers les câbles, ou les gémissements des ouvriers auraient-ils fusionné dans une cacophonie de murmures indignés et de prières désespérées ? Perdus, embourbés dans des problèmes insignifiants, oublieux de leurs devoirs... Ici, sur les ponts de la grande arche {rt_mf|du|de la} Domin, leurs voix grincent comme si elles étaient rongées par la rouille et leurs yeux deviennent vite ternis par le manque de lumière et le labeur.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Havaya kötü bir kokuyla kasvetli sesler hâkim. Makinelerin uğultusuyla vızıltısı, tüm düşünceleri bastırıyor. Gerilimin çınlayan sesi duyuluyor... Tüm bunlar, kablolardan akıp giden güçlü enerjinin eseri mi? Yoksa işçilerin feryatları, öfkeli fısıltıların ve beyhude yere edilen duaların ahenksizliğine mi karışmış? Kaybolmuş, ufak tefek dertlere bulaşmış ve vazifeye kayıtsız kalmış sesleri, pasla kaplanmışçasına çatırdıyor. Gözleri, Domin'in yüce arkının işçi güvertelerindeki sonu gelmeyen angaryalar ve ışık yoksunluğuyla kısılmış.{/n}

Lost, mired in petty troubles, unmindful of duty, their voices creak as if covered in rust and their eyes are dimmed by the endless drudgery and lack of light here on the working decks of the Domin's great ark.{/n}
